caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Petitioner v. KARLOS EUGENE CADDELL,

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Middle District.

opinion.posture: No. 307 MAL 2004, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Superior Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 21st day of September, 2004, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED.
